General.Name: CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited
General.Description: CH. Karnchang Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand and the Lao People's Democratic Republic. It operates through Construction and Related Service; and Investment in Infrastructure Business segments. The company's construction business engages in construction by accepting engagements from government agencies, state enterprises, and private entities in the form of main contractor and sub-contractor. In addition, it invests in infrastructure project development business, which includes transportation, mass rapid transit, water infrastructure, and electric power systems through operate-transfer, build-transfer-operate, build-own-operate, build-own-operate-transfer, etc.; and engages in the sale of construction materials and rents construction. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
